summary.para: Creates a single instance of an imagelist and returns an interface pointer to it.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: A reference to the CLSID—a GUID that identifies the COM object to be created. This should be CLSID_ImageList.

param.name: punkOuter
param.para: A pointer to the outer interface that aggregates the object created by this function, or NULL if no aggregation is desired.

param.name: riid
param.para: Reference to the desired interface ID.

param.name: ppv
param.para: When this method returns, contains the interface pointer requested in riid. This is normally , which provides the method.

returns.para: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Before calling this function, COM must be initialized by calling or .

Call ImageList_CoCreateInstance for a customized image list; otherwise, call to load the system image list. Call with the uflag parameter set to SHGFI_SYSICONINDEX to retrieve a handle to the system image list.
